Job Title: AI Automation Engineer
Location: Remote
Employment Type: Full-time, Permanent
Work Roster: 10AM-6PM (Melbourne Time)
Experience Requirement: 4+ years
Start Date: Immediate


About the Role

We're looking for a dynamic and tech savvy AI Automation Engineer to join our client's team. This role is perfect for someone with a strong foundation in automation, scripting, and cloud technologies—who thrives in a collaborative, fast-moving environment. You will be directly engaging with our client's end clients to understand their automation needs and delivering tailored AI-driven solutions that drive business efficiency.


Key Responsibilities

Design, develop, and deploy custom automation solutions using low-code/no-code tools.
Integrate and optimise workflows for systems such as n8n, make.com and Zapier
Host, manage, and scale microservices in AWS or Azure environments.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to implement AI-powered automation aligned with business objectives.
Ensure all solutions are scalable, secure, and maintainable.
Document processes and support knowledge sharing within the team.


Required Skills

Experienced with automation in environments like n8n, make.com, or Zapier.
Background in hosting and maintaining microservices on AWS or Azure.
Experience working with low-code/no-code platforms for rapid deployment.
Understanding of cloud infrastructure and technologies associated with AI integration.
Proven experience in custom scripting (Python, JavaScript) for automation purposes.
Ability to think beyond traditional machine learning approaches—we are not seeking someone from a pure ML ecosystem.


Cultural Fitness

Excellent verbal and written communication skills—fluent English is a must.
A dynamic personality who can work independently and bring positive energy to a small, agile team.
Experience in agile teams or start-up environments.
Strong analytical and problem-solving mindset.


Why Join Us?

Exciting Global Projects – Work with international clients and gain exposure to diverse industries.
Collaborative Culture – Be part of a highly skilled and supportive team that values innovation, teamwork, and professional growth.
Work-Life Balance – Fixed shifts aligned with Brisbane time, allowing for structured weekends and a balanced schedule.
